title: The Art of Political Lying - final observation

content.question: Which of the following comes closest to the meaning of the concluding observation in Paragraph 3 ("Here ... friends")?

choices.label: Certain politicians have injured the nation by diverting its resources to their own pockets.
Powerful liars have manipulated language to escape punishment for their transgressions.
The public is so envious of successful liars that it has come to hold honest people in contempt.
The devious speech of liars has so confused the public that no one knows whom to trust.

content.answer: The devious speech of liars has so confused the public that no one knows whom to trust.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
